segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman looks while drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely oblivious to the water overflowing and the kids' antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water streaming down the cabinet doors, creating a real mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is getting larger by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are taking advantage of her distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, trying to get as many cookies as possible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl is being careful not to make any noise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated that no one is paying attention to what's really important here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink has been overflowing for quite some time now, and it's only getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon and puts a stop to all this.
segments.speaker: PAR
